nodes.text: The Churnis sector was a sector located in the Mid Rim. The planets Ansion, Fahariyn, Gaulix, Soltan, Trauchta, Sulomu, Gilatter VIII, Kalaan, Rustibar, and Alderbathe were located within this sector.

The Churnis sector was a sector with a presence of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. One of its leadership roles was the Secretary of Industry for Churnis that organized the ore production for the Alliance in the sector.
Following the Battle of Endor, the Churnis sector was among the first sectors to throw off the Empire.
